original_text: And they, when they had heard that he was alive, and had been seen of her, believed not.
korean_text: 그들은 예수께서 살아나셨다는 것과 마리아에게 보이셨다는 것을 듣고도 믿지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: And they, when they had heard that he was alive
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그가 살아 있다는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: and had been seen of her
